title: Analysis of dislocation defects in compositionally step-graded α-(AlxGa1−x)2O3 layers
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31570-31576
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06182A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tatsuya Yasuoka, Hiromu Susami, Li Liu, Giang T. Dang, Toshiyuki Kawaharamura
The dislocations in α-(AlxGa1−x)2O3 layers were bent by the strain caused by the composition change, resulting in a decrease in the number of dislocations.
